**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  

**Chief Operating Officer** | Artichoke Art & Fashion School | 2019 – 2021  
- Managed sales for short-term art education courses.  
- Directed full-cycle project management, including curriculum development, marketing strategies, and enrollment tracking.  
- Led planning and execution of weekend events, including master classes and public talks.  
- Maintained student accounting records and managed the student database.  
- Supervised a team of six, delegating tasks and ensuring workflow efficiency.  
- Conducted hiring processes and negotiated employment contracts.  

**Entrepreneur / Proprietor** | ФОП Петрова С.С. / МЕДТЕХНІКА | 2013 – 2019  
- Oversaw daily retail operations for medical equipment and related products.  
- Managed supplier relationships, including contract negotiations and logistics coordination.  
- Supervised inventory processes, including receipt, relocation, revaluation, and supplier returns.  
- Maintained financial records for supplier payments, contractor agreements, and customer transactions.  
- Handled recruitment and employee selection.  

**KEY ACHIEVEMENTS**  
- Successfully planned and executed multiple projects, meeting objectives within set priorities.  
- Coordinated simultaneous project development while maintaining efficiency.  
- Implemented effective delegation, scheduling, and workflow organization.  
- Secured favorable contract terms while upholding quality standards.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Dedicated Team Leader with 8 months of experience in organizing team operations and project coordination. Proven ability to motivate teams, delegate tasks, and monitor performance to achieve project goals. Advancing expertise through continued Google Project Management certification.  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  
**Team Leader** | [Company Name] | [Dates of Employment]  
* Promoted to Team Leader after three weeks of service, leading the team for 8 months.  
* Organized team work and fostered an inspiring environment with open communication.  
* Set clear team goals, delegated tasks, and established deadlines for the internal team.  
* Oversaw day-to-day operations, managed project progress, and allocated resources.  
* Monitored team performance and reported progress to stakeholders.  
* Represented and advocated for team needs to upper management.  
* Motivated team members, led by example, and recognized high performance.  
* Identified training needs and provided coaching to improve team member skills.  
* Addressed team feedback and resolved problems as they arose.  
* Organized team-building activities to improve collaboration.  

**EDUCATION & CERTIFICATIONS**  
**Google Project Management Certificate (Coursera)** | In Progress  
* Project Planning: Putting It All Together | Current Course  
* Project Initiation: Starting a Successful Project | Nov 2022 – Dec 2022 | Grade: 87.76%  
* Foundations of Project Management | Jun 2022 – Nov 2022 | Grade: 89.03%  

**SKILLS**  
* **Project Management Knowledge:** Basic knowledge of Waterfall, Agile, Scrum, Kanban, Lean, and Six Sigma.  
* **Project Fundamentals:** Defining project scope, goals, deliverables, and success criteria. Familiar with SMART and OKR methods. Understanding of the Triple Constraint (scope, time, cost).  
* **Project Tools & Documentation:** Experience creating project charters and evaluating project management tools. Familiar with stakeholder analysis (Power Grid, RACI charts) and Cost-Benefit Analysis.  
* **Resource Management:** Understanding of project resource needs including budget, people, and materials.  
* **Soft Skills:** Flexibility, time-management, strategic planning, multitasking, prioritization, fast learning, proactivity, and escalation.  
* **Languages:** English (Advanced), Ukrainian (First Language), Russian (First Language).

EXPERIENCED ACCOUNT MANAGER  

15+ years of experience building, maintaining, and executing successful creative, production, and digital marketing campaigns and projects. Proven ability to establish strong, productive relationships with internal teams and clients. Adept at overseeing operational progress and monitoring cross-company projects. Skilled in leading staff members and evaluating project progress to achieve timely results.  

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  

Account Manager  
- Built, maintained, and executed successful creative, production, and digital marketing campaigns.  
- Established strong and productive relationships with internal teams and clients.  
- Oversaw operational progress and monitored cross-company projects.  
- Led staff members and evaluated project progress to ensure timely results.  

EDUCATION & CERTIFICATION  

DAO PM, IAMPM Laboratory of Non-Technical IT Education  
- Gained practical skills in creating project documentation and working with various contract types.  
- Communicated effectively with customers and project teams.  
- Managed project risks, resources, and timelines.  
- Conducted business correspondence and managed project documentation.  
- Managed customer expectations and presented solutions, demos, and prototypes.  
- Created Work Breakdown Structures (WBS) and delegated tasks to performers.  
- Prioritized tasks and workflow.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Experienced Account, Sales, and Project Manager with proven abilities in implementation, operational assessment, and functional requirements analysis for businesses of all sizes. Skilled negotiator and networker with strong critical thinking, highly organized, and methodical in overseeing daily milestones for high-performance teams. Expertise in commercial, production, sales, planning, and non-IT deployment.  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE & SKILLS**  

**Sales & Account Management:**  
- B2B Sales: Commercial offers, negotiations, contracts/agreements, billing.  
- Account Management: Maintaining ongoing customer relationships.  
- Client Availability: Available online for clients 24/7.  

**Operations & Project Management:**  
- Operations Management: Accounting, SWOT analysis, cost reduction, monitoring compliance with profitability indicators.  
- Project Implementation & Management.  
- HR: Hiring employees for the department.  
- Experience guiding business from start-up to full-fledged independent functioning.  

**Industry & Client Experience:**  
- Worked with large international product companies including Rosneft (Russia), Gazprom (Russia), Arkema (France), Huntsman Corporation (USA), GSFC (India), Repsol (Spain).  

**Technical & Digital Skills:**  
- Software: MS Office, MS Project, some Jira experience.  
- SMM: Google Ads, Facebook Ads.  
- Actively developing in IT business processes.  

**EDUCATION & DEVELOPMENT**  
- **Master’s Degree** in Economics; **PHD courses** in Economics.  
- **Bachelor’s Degree** in International Law; **Master’s degree courses** in International Law.  
- Attending online Software Product Management courses at the University of Altera (Canada).  

**ADDITIONAL QUALIFICATIONS**  
- **Languages:** Advanced English.  
- **Work Flexibility:** Able to work on Eastern Standard Time and Ukrainian time.  
- **Core Competencies:** Full understanding of business processes, customer needs, and employee capabilities. Quick learner. Communicative. Positive mentality.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Results-driven Project Manager and entrepreneur with over a decade of hands-on experience in launching and managing projects from concept to completion. Proven ability to direct teams, implement project management frameworks, and drive revenue growth. Skilled in cross-functional leadership, B2B/B2C communication, and problem-solving. Seeking to contribute to a structured team or assist in developing core processes within GameDev, Production, IT, or Fashion sectors.  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  

**Founder & Project Manager | Personal Clothing Brand** | 2012 – 2014  
- Launched and managed all aspects of a startup venture, achieving $25,000 in annual revenue within the first two years through disciplined self-education and direct execution.  
- Orchestrated and led two successful Kickstarter campaigns, securing $124,000 and $431,000 in community funding.  
- Directed full project lifecycle including scope definition, scheduling, art direction, and brand management.  
- Led and coordinated teams of artists and managers, facilitating clear B2B and B2C communication.  

**SKILLS**  
- **Project Management:** Project Launching, Scope Management, Scheduling, Team Leadership, Problem-Solving  
- **Methodologies & Tools:** Agile, Scrum, Waterfall, KanBan, Gantt, Asana, Trello, Jira  
- **Creative & Technical:** Art Direction, Brand Management, Adobe Illustrator (AI), Adobe After Effects (AE), Photoshop (PS), 3D Coat, ZBrush, Ableton  
- **Sector Experience:** Game Development, Production, IT, Fashion  

**AREAS OF INTEREST**  
Seeking a role within a team possessing a strong operational structure or one requiring assistance in implementing core project management essentials. Eager to support artists and designers through shared experiential knowledge. Committed to hands-on learning and skill advancement in related disciplines.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**
Experienced Project Manager with a background in publishing and film, now applying expertise in IT project management within an outsource company. Proven track record in team leadership, complex problem-solving, and delivering under pressure. Recognized for effective recruitment and operational coordination in dynamic environments.

**WORK EXPERIENCE**

**IT Project Manager** | Outsource Company  
_February 2022 – Present_  
* Manage IT projects utilizing Agile methodologies.  
* Oversee web and mobile development lifecycles and project planning.  
* Facilitate team coordination and motivation using Slack, Trello, and Jira.  

**Project Manager** (Publishing and Film Industry)  
* Served as a team member for the “Best Service production in the world” at Radioaktivefilm.  
* Acted as a fixer and production coordinator for international clients including the US Olympics Committee in Kyiv, BBC’s “Top Gear,” and Aljazeera.  

**IT Recruiter**  
* Listed among the ten most effective IT recruiters in Ukraine in 2015 by DOU.ua and jinni.co.  

**EDUCATION & CERTIFICATIONS**

**SheCodes Basics** | Online Coding Course  
_October 2022_  
Credential ID: 2cae7c4c6951922e89181950f7750d6e  

**DAO PM** | IAMP Online Course  
_March 2021_  

**Pre Project Management Program** | MindsetPM  
_April 2019_  
Credential ID: PM-ONLINE-20190429-02  

**To Be a Manager** | MindsetPM  
_April 2019_  
Credential ID: 20190410-1629  

**SKILLS & COMPETENCIES**

* **Project Management:** Agile practices, web/mobile development lifecycle, project planning.  
* **Tools:** Slack, Trello, Jira.  
* **Soft Skills:** Team motivation, problem-solving, excellent communication, fluent written and spoken English.  
* **Personal Attributes:** Tolerant to critical and stressful situations, easygoing, decisive, quick learner, highly responsible, capable of delivering powerful executions, friendly, good sense of humor.  

**CAREER OBJECTIVE**
To practice and improve my knowledge as a Project Manager. To contribute to interesting projects, develop new skills, and become a valued member of a cohesive team.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Experienced project manager with 1.5+ years of project and team management expertise in digital marketing. Delivered measurable results by driving client engagement and revenue growth through targeted campaigns, streamlined team management, and structured client communication protocols.  

**KEY ACCOMPLISHMENTS**  
* Increased ROI through highly targeted digital advertising campaigns for an e-commerce company.  
* Boosted the company's average revenue per service by 1.5 times by optimizing team management and client communication strategies.  
* Sustained an average client retention cycle of 6+ months with the agency.  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  

**Project Manager** | [Company Name, City, State – Optional]  
* Planned and executed targeted digital advertising campaigns to drive sales and maximize ROI.  
* Collaborated with marketing and sales teams to define campaign objectives, including specific sales targets and ROI goals.  
* Conducted market research to identify promising customer segments and refine target demographics.  
* Optimized campaigns across multiple channels, including social media, search engines, and display networks.  
* Provided regular performance reports to stakeholders, highlighting key metrics such as click-through rates, conversion rates, and ROI.  
* Managed project teams, ensuring effective communication and timely task completion.

[Your Name]  
[Phone Number] | [Email Address] | [Location] | [LinkedIn Profile/Portfolio URL]  

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Results-driven Project Manager with a strong track record of leading teams and managing complex product lifecycles in a high-pressure broadcast news environment. Certified in IT project management methodologies, aiming to leverage proven leadership, organizational, and communication skills in the IT sector. Skilled in multitasking, risk management, and stakeholder reporting.  

**CERTIFICATIONS**  
* Google Project Management Professional Certificate  
* Beetroot Academy – Project Management in IT Course  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  

**Project Manager** | [Previous Company Name], [City, State]  
[Dates of Employment]  

* Managed, organized, and directed a cross-functional team of 20+ members, ensuring efficient project execution and on-time delivery.  
* Oversaw the end-to-end lifecycle of 4 major news product projects, from ideation and specification through development to final realization.  
* Prioritized, estimated, and delegated tasks to streamline project workflows and meet deadlines.  
* Facilitated agile ceremonies, including planning meetings, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives, to enhance team productivity.  
* Maintained detailed project documentation using Avid Newsroom Computer System, Google Sheets, and Excel, delivering regular updates to key stakeholders.  
* Managed project changes and mitigated risks during execution phases to ensure smooth operations.  
* Coordinated live broadcasts by collaborating closely with the technical support and hardware-studio teams.  
* Mentored and trained TV presenters on live broadcast execution and pre-broadcast planning.  

**SKILLS**  
* **Project Management:** Project Lifecycle Management, Agile Methodologies, Risk & Change Management, Task Prioritization & Delegation, Stakeholder Reporting  
* **Tools:** Avid Newsroom Computer System, Google Workspace, Microsoft Excel  
* **Soft Skills:** Team Leadership & Mentoring, Multitasking, Communication, Time Management, Accuracy, Thrives Under Pressure  

**LANGUAGES**  
* English (Fluent)

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Motivated project management graduate adept in Agile, Waterfall, and fundamental project management methodologies. Committed to leveraging theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience to deliver impactful contributions within a collaborative team environment while advancing professional growth.  

**EDUCATION & CERTIFICATION**  
PM School Kharkiv – Project Management  
* Comprehensive coursework encompassing theoretical frameworks and practical applications in Project Management.  

**SKILLS & METHODOLOGIES**  
* **Methodologies:** Proficient in Agile (Scrum, Kanban) and Waterfall methodologies.  
* **Project Lifecycle:** Skilled in managing the full development lifecycle, including requirements gathering, analysis, and project decomposition.  
* **Project Planning:** Experienced in developing Work Breakdown Structures (WBS) and project schedules using Gantt Charts.  
* **Risk Management:** Knowledgeable in risk management principles, including crafting Risk Management Matrices.  
* **Documentation:** Proven ability to produce detailed project documentation, such as Vision documents, SRS (aligned with IEEE 830 standard), and User Stories for HR management systems.  
* **Practical Training:** Analyzed real-world scenarios to address challenges faced by Project Managers in day-to-day operations.  

**PROFESSIONAL READING**  
Software Project Management For Dummies | Testing dot com | Kanban and Scrum - Making the Most of Both | Scrum and XP from the Trenches | Scrum | Black Book of Manager | Deadline | Time Drive | Fundamentals of Project Management | PMBOK Guide | Business Analysis for Practitioners | Agile Practice Guide | Harvard Business Review on Becoming a High Performance Manager.

**PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY**  
Experienced event management professional with a strong foundation in full-cycle project coordination, from concept development to execution. Skilled in managing cross-functional teams, budgets, and vendor relationships to deliver specialized industry events. Transitioning into IT by leveraging foundational project management expertise in a Junior Specialist role.  

**PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE**  

**Smile Expo** | Event Project Manager  
Aug 2021 – Mar 2022  
- Developed comprehensive project concepts, including themes, visual identities, guidelines, and venue selection.  
- Delegated tasks to project teams, established priorities, and ensured adherence to deadlines.  
- Monitored task execution and tracked project progress to ensure timely delivery.  
- Oversaw full event preparation, including venue procurement, speaker acquisition, and conference agenda development.  
- Created and managed project budgets to ensure financial efficiency.  

**Media Group “House and Interior”** | Project Coordinator  
Feb 2021 – Aug 2021  
- Analyzed and maintained social media pages for the media group.  
- Monitored task execution and project timelines to ensure on-schedule completion.  
- Organized nationwide competitions, managing all operational logistics.  
- Researched, contacted, and secured agreements with speakers and hosts.  
- Coordinated transportation and documentation for speakers.  
- Sourced and negotiated with media partners and equipment vendors.  
- Communicated with contractors and company representatives to facilitate competition organization.  

**KEY PROJECTS & ACHIEVEMENTS**
